Authors:
Altielys Casale Magnago, Maria Alice Neves, Rosa Mara
Borges da Silveira
Title:
Fistulinella ruschii sp. nov., and a new record of
Fistulinella campinaranae for the Atlantic Forest, Brazil
Keywords:
Austroboletoideae, Boletaceae, fungal diversity,
Neotropics, taxonomy
Abstract:
Fistulinella is a small, pantropical genus of boletoid
fungi in the subfamily Austroboletoideae. In this paper, Fistulinella
ruschii from the Atlantic Forest is proposed as new to science and F.
campinaranae, known from the Brazilian Amazon, is recorded for the first
time for the Atlantic Forest. Macro- and microscopic descriptions,
molecular data (rDNA ITS and LSU sequences), photographs of the
basidiomes, and scanning electron microscopy images of the basidiospores
are provided for both species.
